name: taskMaster-todoist-mcp
description: A lightweight Model Context Protocol (MCP) server that enables natural language interaction with your Todoist tasks directly from your IDE. Built with simplicity and maintainability in mind.

name: kindlegpt-notesenhancer
description: A Python script that automates the extraction, enhancement, and storage of Kindle book notes in Obsidian via Google Drive, streamlining the note-taking process for Kindle users.

name: weld-anomaly-detection
description: A Welding Anomaly Detection system using unsupervised Machine Learning and statistical analysis to identify anomalies in welding process curves.

name: Federated-Distributed-ML-Traffic-Prediction
description: Implementation and evaluation of federated and distributed machine learning approaches for traffic prediction, including models, datasets, and results.

name: ARTICLEES_WEBAPP_FLASK
description: A web application where users can create a profile and write articles to share with other members of the community. Fully responsive interface with support for multiple databases.

name: mingolladaniele.github.io
description: Personal portfolio website built with Bootstrap, featuring dynamic GitHub project loading, contact form, and automated CI/CD via GitHub Actions.
